item.title: Mentioned by Nanaimo News Bulletin
item.description:
Nanaimo teen addresses MP over shark fin imports
Brittany Carpenter, 15, addresses Nanaimo-Alberni Conservative MP James Lunney in his constituency office regarding his decision not to support Bill C-380, a private member's bill that would ban shark fin imports from endangered or threatened species.
